es.uned.lsi.compiler.semantic
Class ScopeManager

java.lang.Object
  es.uned.lsi.compiler.semantic.ScopeManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ScopeManagerIF
public class ScopeManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScopeManagerIF

Class for ScopeManager. The ScopeManager is a factory of scopes that are arranged according to a stack within the manager. When a new scope is created it is pushed on the top of the stack. When a scope is released, the scope is removed from the stack. All created scopes are stored by this manager to can recovery later in translation phase.
